sentences.en: The book recalls other memories of a bygone age.
sentences.cn: 这本书勾起了人们对遥远岁月的其他回忆。

sentences.en: Before his eyes had risen bygone times.
sentences.cn: 在他眼前浮现的是过去的时光。

sentences.en: Many once beautiful buildings stand empty, evidencing a bygone time of spirit and pride.
sentences.cn: 许多曾经美丽的建筑如今空空地伫立在那里，见证了昔日的精神和骄傲。
